pages.text: 15|32|(atarku umatu iraivan iplisai nokki) ‘‘iplise! Ciram panintavarkalutan cerntu niyum ciram paniyata karanamenna?'' Enru kettan

15|33|atarkavan ‘‘(kayntapin) captam kotukkakkutiya picupicuppana kalimannal ni pataitta manitanukku (neruppal pataikkappatta) nan ciram paniya tayarillai; (enenral, nan avaraivita melanavan)'' enru kurinan
15|34|atarku iraivan ‘‘ni inkiruntu appurappattuvitu. Niccayamaka ni (namatu camukattiliruntu) virattappattu vittay'' enru kurinan
15|35|melum, ‘‘vicaranai nal (varum) varai un mitu niccayamaka en capamum (kopamum) untavataka!'' (Enrum kurinan)
15|36|atarkavan ‘‘en iraivane! (Irantavarkal) uyir perrelumpum nal (varum) varai ni enakku avakacamali'' enru kettan
15|37|atarku (iraivan) ‘‘niccayamaka (avvare) kurippitta annal varaiyilum unakku avakacamalikkappattatu'' enran
15|38|atarku (iraivan) ‘‘niccayamaka (avvare) kurippitta annal varaiyilum unakku avakacamalikkappattatu'' enran
15|39|Atarkavan ‘‘en iraivane! Ni ennai vali ketuttatan karanamaka pumiyilulla (porulkalai) nan avarkalukku alakakak kanpittu avarkal anaivaraiyum valiketuppen
15|40|eninum, avarkalil kalapparra (paricutta) ullattai utaiya un (nalla) atiyarkalait tavira; (avarkalai vali ketukka ennal mutiyatu)'' enru kurinan
15|41|atarku (iraivan) kuriyatavatu: ‘‘Atutan ennitam (varuvatarkuriya) nerana vali.’‘
15|42|(Manattuymaiyutaiya) en atiyarkalitattil niccayamaka unakku oru celvakkum irukkatu. Valikettil unnaip pinparriyavarkalait tavira
15|43|(unnaip pinparriya) anaivarukkum vakkalikkappatta itam niccayamaka narakamtan
15|44|annarakattirku elu vacalkal irukkinrana. Ovvoru vacalilum (cellakkutiya vakaiyil) avarkal pala pirivukalakap pirikkappattu vituvarkal
15|45|niccayamaka, iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalo corkkankalilum (atilulla) niraruvikalilum (ullacamaka) irupparkal
15|46|(avarkalai nokki) ninkal iterrattutanum accamarravarkalakavum itil nulaiyunkal'' (enru kurappatum)
15|47|(oruvarukku oruvarmitu im'maiyil) avarkalin nencankalil irunta kurotankalai nam nikkivituvom. (Avarkalum) cakotararkalaka oruvar oruvarai mukam nokki kattilkalil (ullacamakac cayntu) irupparkal
15|48|atil avarkalai oru ciramamum anukatu. Atil iruntu avarkal veliyerrappatavum mattarkal
15|49|(napiye!) Nir en atiyarkalukku arivippiraka: ‘‘Niccayamaka nan mikka mannippavan, mikak karunaiyutaiyavan aven
15|50|innum niccayamaka en vetanaitan mikka kotiya vetanai
15|51|(napiye!) Iprahimutaiya viruntalikalin varalarrai nir avarkalukku arivippiraka
